1.9.name: wordpress/jm-html5-and-responsive-gallery
1.9.description:
Once activated the plugin removes ugly default markup and adds a few rules to make it more responsive. It's meant to be customized with your own CSS and JavaScript e.g. for a lightbox or a slideshow. I included a demo with a slider you can customize. Too see it in action just decomment lines 147-148 in the PHP file and lines 126 to 168 in CSS file. Enjoy !

Sorry guys, 1.7 was a wrong update, now it's fixed !

This plugin is recommanded by WPMU.org : *The Ultimate Guide to Photoblogging With WordPress *New HTML5 Responsive WordPress Gallery Plugin Improves Default Gallery
